page.title: 02CLUBS
page.content:
Sport-Football League Club, many smaller amateur clubs based on firms, pubs and areas. Private sports clubs, golf,tennis,football,cricket,rugby, hockey,cycling,swimming,gymnastics, squash,athletics,badminton,table- tennis,karate,angling,pigeon homing, chess,rifle shooting,horse riding, judo,archery.
Other clubs based on adult education courses,churches,chapels,Y.M.C.A. The Chesterfield Citizen Guide 1985/6 contains many hundreds of them.
The Guide Company:- Patrols make up a company, each has a different emblem. Guides go to camp each year with cooking and singing around the fire. Interests and hobbies are developed, for which badges are awarded by a tester appointed by the guider.
